Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Penn in 1979...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1982, hitting .296 with 13 HR, 73 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against West Texas on 6/5/1984...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Troy on 6/30/1984...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/6/1986 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 9/25/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1987, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Coney Island on 6/1/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Manchester on 8/1/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1991, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 9/19/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1991, hitting .526 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1992, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1992, hitting .350 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1992, hitting .291 with 31 HR, 105 RBI...
